post.body: what do you think about macworld btw?
uh something new? something blue (or mini)?
PDF-Forms, like those for taxes in Germany? I tried and suggest to pick another poison.
I belive there is some sw to do postproduction during recording? how was that called? boinx-something? ;-)
I also consider "Hercules in New York" a classic, - totally worth it. Do the Conan comics extend the movie's storyline?
it is some kind of flash client for flash apps outside the browser. I see twitteriffic is build that way.
I'm on NatsuLion on the iPhone. Do you use some Adobe Air on the desktop?
while reading #wanted i wonder if i really wanna like it, great art and promising plot but ultra violent, may want to recap #ifanboy com ...
Heading north with gamma-ray, already feels like christmas. #waddens #dinner
just saw #bus Adventskalender, it's not the mac pro!
wrapping presents, may be I'm late this year, but this will be fun to watch getting unwrapped
replacing local nas-box with the living room's mac-mini for an even less energy hungry setup
still thinking about shopping today, less crowded than expected. how is that? do we really have to prepare for economy's downfall
Feel like getting a cold. Just in time for the holidays.*sigh*
Having a look at 25c3. If this is worth the ride?
Trying to get PowerBook g4 to boot w/o pushing the power button, I do use external display and keyboard with the book under the desk
Lame one. The brothers control this sport, I believe. Is there anybody besides the giant from Russia?
exited about the new Klitsch-k.o.
In public library. Has becone a nice place.
listening bus.de: NatsuLion - Yet Another Twitter Client
